Module com.example.mycasinofx
Package com.example.mycasinofx.controllers.games.roulette

Class RouletteController

java.lang.Object
com.example.mycasinofx.controllers.games.roulette.RouletteController
public class RouletteController extends Object
Controller class for managing the Roulette game UI.

      public RouletteController()
      Constructor for RouletteController.

  • Method Details

    • setProfit

      public void setProfit()
      Sets the profit for the player.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. This method sets up event handlers for mouse clicks on the roulette grid and initializes other necessary components.

    • setPlayButtonDisable

      public void setPlayButtonDisable()
      Sets the play button disable state based on the game state. Disables the play button if the game cannot be started.

    • setNonActiveButton

      public void setNonActiveButton(String string, javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets the CSS style class for a button to make it non-active.
      Parameters:
      string - The type of bet (e.g., "Red", "Black", "Green").
      button - The button to set as non-active.

    • setActiveButton

      public void setActiveButton(String string, javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets the CSS style class for a button to make it active.
      Parameters:
      string - The type of bet (e.g., "Red", "Black", "Green").
      button - The button to set as active.

    • clickButtonStake

      public boolean clickButtonStake(boolean flag, javafx.scene.control.Button button, int index, String string)
      Handles clicking on a betting button to place a stake. Marks different kinds of bets as already made or as available for selection
      Parameters:
      flag - The current state of the button (true for active, false for non-active).
      button - The button being clicked.
      index - The index of the stake.
      string - The type of bet (e.g., "Red", "Black", "Green").
      Returns:
      The updated state of the button (true for active, false for non-active).

    • even

      public void even()
      Handles clicking on the "Even" button to place a stake on even numbers.

      public void odd()
      Handles clicking on the "Odd" button to place a stake on odd numbers.

      Handles clicking on the "Black" button to place a stake on black numbers.

      public void resetButtons()
      Resets the CSS style for all buttons.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all components of the UI and game state. Used before switching to another scene or returning to the main menu.

    • playRoulette

      public void playRoulette() throws IOException
      Handles clicking on the "Play" button to start the roulette game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.

    • goMainMenu

      public void goMainMenu() throws IOException, SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Navigates to the main menu.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class definition is not found.

    • doStake

      public void doStake() throws IOException
      Opens a dialog to allow the player to place a stake.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.
